products.title: La Lagartija
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... A perfect start to your journey.

products.title: El Tigre
products.description: A dark coffee with hints of grapefruit and caramelized peanuts.

products.title: La Cucaracha
products.description: Sweet with notes of caramel, orange, and strawberry.

about.description1: Who are we? Just a bunch of friends with a love for a good coffee and desire to create something new, something original.
about.description2: Our coffees reflect us - young, wild and free. We are on the journey of new tastes...
